assemble.title: Assemble
assemble.subtitle: Static site generator
assemble.desc: Static site generator and rapid prototyping framework for Node.js, Grunt.js, and Yeoman and Gulp. Render templates with Handlebars, Lo-Dash or any template engine.

handlebars.title: Handlebars
handlebars.subtitle: Logic-less JavaScript templating engine
handlebars.desc: Handlebars.js is an extension to the Mustache templating language created by Chris Wanstrath. Handlebars.js and Mustache are both logicless templating languages ... .

gulp.title: Gulp
gulp.subtitle: JavaScript task runner
gulp.desc: Gulp is a JS-based toolkit/task runner that has a large ecosytem of plugins and provides fast, reliable automation for development workflows.
